com.samsung.android.sdk.motion

Class SmotionActivityNotification

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.motion.SmotionActivityNotification

  • public class SmotionActivityNotification
extends Object
    This class provides the functionality for getting notifications about user activities. When the user walks, runs, stops, or gets in a vehicle, the class collects the status and accuracy information of the activity.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  SmotionActivityNotification.ChangeListener
      This listener interface receives activity notification events.
      static class  SmotionActivityNotification.Info
      This class contains the activity notification event information and provides methods to access it.
      static class  SmotionActivityNotification.InfoFilter
      This class provides specific activity notification actions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SmotionActivityNotification(Looper looper, Smotion motion)
      Creates an SmotionActivityNotification instance with the specified looper and Smotion instances.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void start(SmotionActivityNotification.InfoFilter filter, SmotionActivityNotification.ChangeListener listener)
      Add the specified ChangeListener instance.
      void stop()
      Remove the ChangeListener instance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SmotionActivityNotification

        public SmotionActivityNotification(Looper looper,
                           Smotion motion)
        Creates an SmotionActivityNotification instance with the specified looper and Smotion instances.
        Parameters:
        looper - The looper of the main thread in your application.
        motion - The Smotion instance.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - Thrown if the looper or Smotion object passed is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the Context passed is null. This can happen if you did not initialize the Motion package before creating the SmotionActivityNotification instance.
        IllegalStateException - Thrown if the device does not support SmotionActivityNotification.
        Since:
        API Level 2.0

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start(SmotionActivityNotification.InfoFilter filter,
         SmotionActivityNotification.ChangeListener listener)
        Add the specified ChangeListener instance.
        Parameters:
        filter - The InfoFilter instance for creating activity notification events.
        receiver - The ChangeListener instance for receiving activity notification events.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Thrown if a listener is already registered or the device does not support SmotionActivityNotification.
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the listener or InfoFilter passed is null or if the InfoFilter passed is empty.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Remove the ChangeListener instance.

        You must call stop() before the process (application) finishes.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Thrown when stop() is called before calling the start() method.
